dimarray documentation¶

Welcome to dimarray documentation.

dimarray provide a numpy array with labelled axes and dimensions, in the spirit of pandas but generalized to N dimensions. It supports metadata and netCDF4 I/O.

Further development¶

All suggestions for improvement very welcome, please file an issue on github: https://github.com/perrette/dimarray/ for further discussion.
